com.fizzikgames.fizlib.math.geom

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fizzikgames.fizlib.math.geom.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic Helper class for representing the 2D geometrical shape formed by 4 points in the subspace R ^ 2. Does not throw exceptions for invalid width and height.
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    Maxim Tiourin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle(float awidth, float aheight)
      Creates a rectangle at the origin with the given width and height
      Rectangle(float ax, float ay, float awidth, float aheight)
      Creates a rectangle at the given point with the given width and height.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(float ax, float ay)
      Returns true if the rectangle contains the given point.
      Rectangle copy()
      Returns a copy of the rectangle.
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      float height()
      Returns the height of the rectangle.
      void setBounds(float ax, float ay, float awidth, float aheight)
      Sets the boundaries of the rectangle.
      java.lang.String toString() 
      float width()
      Returns the width of the rectangle.
      float xcenter()
      Returns the x coordinate of the center of the rectangle.
      float xmax()
      Returns the maximum x coordinate of a point that can fit inside the rectangle.
      float xmin()
      Returns the minimum x coordinate of a point that can fit inside the rectangle.
      float ycenter()
      Returns the y coordinate of the center of the rectangle.
      float ymax()
      Returns the maximum y coordinate of a point that can fit inside the rectangle.
      float ymin()
      Returns the minimum y coordinate of a point that can fit inside the rectangle.
